<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChessFinishEffectSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="1136" height="640" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="light" source="game_chessFinishLight_png" anchorOffsetX="435" anchorOffsetY="435" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="320" x="568"/>
		<e:Group id="starGroup" width="200" height="200" anchorOffsetX="100" anchorOffsetY="100" x="568" y="320">
			<e:Image id="star0" source="game_star0_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="-47" y="2"/>
			<e:Image id="star1" source="game_star1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="-67" y="-4"/>
			<e:Image id="chessImg" source="game_chess_blue0_png" anchorOffsetX="21.5" anchorOffsetY="43" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="100.5" y="100"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameResultPanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group touchEnabled="true" width="1136" height="640" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0x050000" fillAlpha="0.8" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="winLabel" text="红方胜利" y="174" textColor="0x0f0101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="392" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="372" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label text="其余玩家进度：" y="242" textColor="0x0F0101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="392" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="372" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="resultLabel0" text="绿方：1/4" y="292" textColor="0x0F0101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="392" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="372" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="resultLabel1" text="绿方：1/4" y="342" textColor="0x0F0101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="392" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="372" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="resultLabel2" text="绿方：1/4" y="392" textColor="0x0F0101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="392" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" x="376" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="lightImg" source="result_light_png" anchorOffsetX="500" anchorOffsetY="500" x="568" y="280.01"/>
		<e:Image id="loseImg" source="result_lose_png" anchorOffsetX="413.5" anchorOffsetY="253" x="568.5" y="320"/>
		<e:Image id="winImg" source="result_win_png" anchorOffsetX="413.5" anchorOffsetY="253" x="568.5" y="320"/>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="result_again_png" x="229" bottom="47"/>
		<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="result_share_png" x="585" bottom="48"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="KnowledgePanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group touchEnabled="true" touchChildren="true" width="1136" height="640" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
		<e:Image id="knowledgeImg" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="140" y="24.01" source="knowledge_4_png"/>
		<e:Image id="okBtn" y="549.34" source="rule_back_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuPanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="1136" height="640" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.7" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="game_menu_bg_png" x="290" y="125"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="game_menu_close_png" y="533" x="378"/>
		<e:ToggleButton id="pauseBtn" label="" x="373" y="342.99">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_menu_pause_png" source.down="game_menu_start_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:ToggleButton id="soundBtn" label="" x="666" y="342.99">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_menu_soundOn_png" source.down="game_menu_soundOff_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:Image id="restartBtn" source="game_menu_restart_png" x="519" y="342.99"/>
		<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="游戏暂停" y="236" anchorOffsetX="0" width="326" anchorOffsetY="0" height="68.67" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="40" x="405"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="OptionPanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="1136" height="640" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
		<e:Image id="bg" source="option_bg_png" x="290" y="83" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:SelectRoleBtn id="selectGreenBtn" x="326.11" y="197" skinName="SelectGreenSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:SelectRoleBtn id="selectRedBtn" x="447.92" y="197" skinName="SelectRedSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:SelectRoleBtn id="selectYellowBtn" x="568.65" y="197" skinName="SelectYellowSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:SelectRoleBtn id="selectBlueBtn" x="688.84" y="197" skinName="SelectBlueSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:ToggleButton id="bgmBtn" label="" x="491.41" y="448" anchorOffsetX="59.75" anchorOffsetY="65.82" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="option_sound_on_png" source.down="option_sound_off_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:ToggleButton id="effectBtn" label="" x="728.16" y="448" anchorOffsetX="59.75" anchorOffsetY="65.82" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="option_sound_on_png" source.down="option_sound_off_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>
		<e:Image id="saveBtn" y="491.8" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="option_save_png" x="378"/>
		<e:Label text="角色阵营" x="344" y="166" size="36" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label text="点击色块，进行角色选择" x="501" y="182" size="18"/>
		<e:Label text="声音设置" x="344" y="324" size="36" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label text="声音" x="344" y="392" size="36" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label text="音效" x="582" y="392" size="36" bold="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RulePanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

		<ns1:ScrollView id="scrollView" width="856" height="482" x="140" y="39.01" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0"/>
			</e:layout>
			<e:Image source="rule_page0_png" x="400" y="-40"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SelectChessPanelSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="uiGroup" height="640" width="1136" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<ns1:Chess x="404.32" y="226" source="game_chess_blue0_png"/>
		<ns1:Chess x="499.64" y="226" source="game_chess_blue0_png"/>
		<ns1:Chess y="226" source="game_chess_blue0_png" x="595.32"/>
		<ns1:Chess x="690.25" y="226" source="game_chess_blue0_png"/>
		<e:RadioButton id="radioBtn" label="" x="408.32" y="324" groupName="a" value="0" selected="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_radio1_png" source.down="game_radio_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:RadioButton label="" x="504.9566666666667" y="324" groupName="a" value="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_radio1_png" source.down="game_radio_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:RadioButton label="" x="600.9833333333333" y="324" groupName="a" value="2">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_radio1_png" source.down="game_radio_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:RadioButton label="" x="698.33" y="324" groupName="a" value="3">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_radio1_png" source.down="game_radio_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:Label text="选择行走棋子" y="179" x="478"/>
		<e:Image id="okBtn" source="game_select_ok_png" y="417.33" x="264.71"/>
		<e:Image id="cancelBtn" source="game_select_cancel_png" x="611.05" y="417.33"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
